text:
hi friends my name is Sonia and welcome
to today's lesson well I'd like to share

something with you a while ago I had a
friend whose name was Peter okay so one

day I was just walking by and I saw him
and I said hey Peter how are things and

he looked at me gave me a really strange
look and said what things I don't have

any things with me and I said no I mean
to say how are you how is everything

going with you and he said oh well
everything's going fine I'm good thank

you so much and then that was that but
then later on I realized why was he so

confused I mean I asked him a very
simple question how are things which

means how is everything going with you
how are you etcetera but he got confused

and then I realized that the word things
is used mostly just for something which

is nonliving which doesn't have any name
any kind of an object so a lot of people

may not really know that there are so
many expressions in the English language

that can be used with the word thing or
things I don't want you to be in that

situation so today we will do a lesson
on expressions with the word thing so

let's have a look the very first one
says what do you think about the whole

thing okay so for example if you know
it's the budget time and the taxes have

been increased by the government so if
you just want to take someone's opinion

about this particular thing you could
say what do you think about the whole

taxes thing so this is a very informal
way okay to get someone's opinion so you

can use this expression to ask for an
opinion it's a good way to start the

conversation what do you think about the
whole taxes thing the next one is the

whole thing looks messed up now if you
want to talk about a problem some kind

of an issue okay so for example if your
boss has decided to move the office into

another building which you don't really
like you don't really find it very

convenient okay so you need to take in
all your papers find everything move all

your stuff around and you don't really
like this entire moving so you could say

well hey this whole moving thing looks
messed up I really don't like it so here

you can use this phrase to talk about an
issue or some kind of a problem okay the

next one now this is a great way to
start off when you need to explain

something to someone or give someone a
reason for something okay so for example

if you have a very close friend okay and
who's going to have his wedding

anniversary party on a Saturday but okay
you have a very important client meeting

to attend which you just can't avoid so
this is a sticky situation how would you

tell your friends so you could say well
hey John

the thing is that I have an extremely
important business meeting to attend so

I can't come to your party but I will
make it up by having lunch with you on

Sunday ok so when you start your
sentence using the thing is that you are

kind of setting up you know and
atmosphere okay for your friend to know

that okay there's something that he's
going to say now which I may not really

like but let's see what he has to say so
the thing is that is a phrase which you

can use to explain something to someone
just look at it you know just one word

thing use in three expressions already
all three of them can be used

differently the next one is
the funny thing is that okay now let me

give you an example and I'm sure you'll
understand well imagine that you've been

planning a shopping a shopping day with
your friends since a couple of weeks now

and you're really excited about it okay
you dress up you take your shopping bag

you've selected a mall to go to and all
of you all meet at the mall okay you've

shopped and everything's done really
excited finally when you go to the

counter okay to pay your bill you put
your hand into your bag and you fine

oops there's no wallet there's no puss
and that's when you can say something

like girls you know the funny thing is
that I forgot my purse okay now you're

using this phrase to talk about
something which you didn't expect at all

all right it's not funny it's actually
something very viewer that happen but

it's a little amusing also in a way so
you could say the funny thing is that I

forgot my purse can someone just pitch
in for me okay the funny thing is that
is to talk about something unexpected

something which you don't really think
could happen

I mean planning a shopping day and
forgetting your pause that's the

weirdest thing to happen to a person the
next one here is here's the thing okay

now here's is basically here plus is all
right so here's the thing this is a

conversation starter and a very great
one which you can use when you want to

make an offer to someone alright so for
example if you are a businessman okay

and you're trying to strike a deal with
another businessman so you could say

well hey here's this thing okay here's
the thing I will give you 80% of the

profits if you run the outlet for me
okay that's a very positive way to make
an offer here's the thing

and this one of course how are things
all right is what I spoke about in the

beginning okay how are things is a very
nice and friendly way to say how's

everything going how's life how's
everything with you okay so it's a nice

informal way to ask how are you for
example how I think so remember this one

okay don't get confused someone asks you
this question the next one here on the

board is things are looking up
so what things what things are looking

up where okay nothing is looking up
anywhere this is a phrase that you can

use when you want to say that everything
is going on very smoothly right now okay

everything in your life is going very
well you're very happy with your current

situation so you can say well hey you
know things are really looking up for me

I just got promoted and I'm really happy
okay so when you want to say that

everything is going when things are
looking up the next one is totally the

opposite all right so when obviously in
life we have our ups and downs you know

it's not always a smooth sailing so when
you are in the sticky situation when

things are not going pretty well you're
a little low in life so you could say

well hey things are pretty bad right now
but I'm sure I'll do better I'm sure

things will go fine in sometime soon
okay so things are pretty bad so let me

just put that down here for you talking
about low situation in life

so hope this doesn't happen to anyone
but if you get fired from your job okay

you could say well hey things are pretty
bad right now I just got fired I hope I

get a job soon okay and the last and
final one that we have is a really nice

one I really like this the great thing
about something is okay now this is a

great way to talk about something
positive especially if you're maybe in

the marketing line all right and you
want to promote your product to someone

you could say well the great thing about
using our product is that it's eco

friendly or maybe if you're someone
who's joined yoga class alright recently

and you really love yoga it's really
doing good for you so you could say well

hey the great thing about yoga is that
it makes you so flexible and keeps you

so fresh and active okay so that's how
you can use the great thing so this is

to talk about something positive and
remember when you use this phrase you

need to really sound positive you need
to have a lot of energy in your tone

because you're talking about something
which is really good all right so this

is how we can use what we've got nine
phrases here all have the word thing all

are pretty different from each other and
just see how such a simple word can be

used in such beautiful ways in the
English language well this brings me to

the end of the lesson I hope that you
guys enjoyed watching this video all

right do keep practicing and take care
of yourself I'll see you soon till then
